LanguageData.DIF_FlashStoperAbasia.label: head shock device
LanguageData.DIF_FlashStoperAbasia.description: Brain suppression device. The field produced by this structure causes paralysis of the body. It can be dangerous if help is not provided. Produces pollution.
LanguageData.DIF_FlashStopKill.label: brain rupture device
LanguageData.DIF_FlashStopKill.description: Brain explosion device. Dangerous without compromise. Produces pollution.
LanguageData.DIF_FlashBoostersleep.label: sleep stasis device
LanguageData.DIF_FlashBoostersleep.description: Stasis field device. It has a positive effect on the body, slowing down the need for sleep. Produces pollution.
LanguageData.BIF_FlashStazisFood.label: hunger stasis device
LanguageData.BIF_FlashStazisFood.description: Stasis field device. It has a positive effect on the body, slowing down the need for hunger. Produces pollution.
LanguageData.BIF_FlashStazisPsy.label: Faraday device
LanguageData.BIF_FlashStazisPsy.description: Stasis field device. Protects from psychic influence.
LanguageData.BIF_immunizerAdgeyzer.label: Immunomodulator
LanguageData.BIF_immunizerAdgeyzer.description: Affects the immune system. It has no direct effect on pathogens, but changes the immune response of cells.
LanguageData.BIF_HealingFactors.label: Healer
LanguageData.BIF_HealingFactors.description: Accelerates healing. The best option for the hospital. The amplifying device could produce both pollution and cancer.
